lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers have become the first team in the NBA to put a sponsorship logo on player uniforms, striking a deal with StubHub for a spot on one of the hottest pieces of real estate available in sports.

headline.main: 76ers 1st NBA Team to Land Jersey Sponsorship With StubHub
headline.print_headline: 76ers 1st NBA Team to Land Jersey Sponsorship With StubHub
